title: Blended Teaching Method Design Scenarios for Elementary Foreign Language (English) Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Innovative curriculum implementation for 21st-century competency enhancement, blended learning environment utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more English communication strategies reflecting 21st-century competencies (critical thinking, collaboration, digital literacy).
Learners can perform self-directed English learning activities at least twice weekly using digital tools (apps/platforms).
Learners can improve their English speaking fluency scores by 20% through peer feedback-based formative assessment.

resources: Subscription to English Language Learning Apps
Digital Teaching Material Kit for Educators

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
